notes:
hold shift
to see entity
outlines

press ctrl+s to save

ctrl+shift+s to export

left-click and drag to
draw annotations

press "a" to switch
to "tile placement"
mode

middle click and drag to
move around the project

press shift over an
entity to resize the
entity whilst drawing

click on the tiles at
the top right of the
screen to change the
selected tile

left click a map square
to place the currently
selected tile

right click a map
square to erase it

in tile edit mode you
draw directly onto
the tiles in the map

right-click to place
a new note, or delete
an existing one

press s to enter
"place entities" mode

if you are not in
"edit tiles" mode
then press escape
and then press q

zoom in and out with
the scroll wheel

press space to change
colour. press 1/2/3
to change brush size

press w to enter
"edit entities" mode

press "r" to switch to
"annotate project" mode

draw onto entities
just like tiles

hold alt and then left-click
on a pixel in a tile to use
the colour

whilst ctrl is held,
each distinct map
square you edit will
be cloned and edited
independently

you cannot change mode
whilst editing a note!

only this copy of
the tile changes

left-click and type to
edit a note. press escape
to stop editing

hold ctrl to erase
instead of drawing

hold alt and then left-click
on a map square to change the
currently selected tile to
match

hold shift to stencil
you drawing to within
a single tile

all copies of
tile are changed

the editing mode is
indicated at the top
left of the screen

left-click and drag to
move entities around
